EmailTemplate.name: Failed-Unable to Process Online
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Recent Application with ICCU
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thank you for applying online for membership with Idaho Central Credit Union. Unfortunately there was an error processing your online membership application. We ask that you re-apply on ICCU.com by selecting the “Join Now” option on the top left-hand side of our home page. We can also complete a membership application in your local branch if that is more convenient for you. If you have questions, please feel free to contact us at 1-800-456-5067 using reference number <CollabJob>.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Idaho Central Credit Union
P.O. Box 2469
Pocatello, ID 83206
d: (208) 239-3000 | f: (208) 239-3055
